summary: REQ-2 appears implemented in AppHeader (logo src updated to /assets/generated/image-4.png, left-positioned, medium sizing with w-auto + object-contain, and click behavior preserved). REQ-1 is not implemented because the image asset file was not added to frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded image `image-4.png` to `frontend/public/assets/generated/image-4.png` so it can be referenced by URL at runtime.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and there is no evidence that `frontend/public/assets/generated/image-4.png` was created or committed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/metadata entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add an image asset and update the header logo; it does not request changes to project tracking metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` content describing various app components and styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating repository summary documentation.
